column6: The most cost-effective body wash for sensitive skin :)
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
column14: I have sensitive skin and if I use other soap or body wash, I either feel dirty or dried out. I'm sure that there are expensive body washes that optimizes your skin condition, but those typically cost a lot more than I'd be willing to pay for. So, I hunt for cheaper products that gets the job done. I've used dove, olay, bath and body works product, body shop products, myers, etc... I really enjoyed using products from body shop because they smell amazing, but they are also not very cost-effective (small containers with a substantial price tag for a body wash). I normally don't use Dial products because they dry my skin out, but this particular body wash has just the right mix. It moisturizes, cleans, smells amazing and it is sold at a reasonable and affordable price point. If you have eczema or other skin condition, I can't say that this will be a "cure" for that; however, I noticed that my skin did not flare as often. I got a three month subscription because these are hard to find in stores. I used to get these from walmart, but they go out of stock from time to time and there is not much price difference even if you get it through amazon.
